statements: SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_containers;
SELECT container_id, location FROM waste_disposal_containers WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_containers WHERE container_type = 'Recycling';
SELECT location, current_inventory FROM waste_disposal_containers ORDER BY last_restock_date DESC;
SELECT container_id, capacity, current_inventory FROM waste_disposal_containers WHERE current_inventory < capacity;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_containers WHERE location = 'Central Park' ORDER BY last_restock_date DESC;
SELECT container_id, location, current_inventory FROM waste_disposal_containers WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT container_type, location, last_restock_date FROM waste_disposal_containers WHERE current_inventory < 50 AND capacity > 50 ORDER BY last_restock_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_containers WHERE last_restock_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY container_type DESC, location ASC;
SELECT container_id, location, capacity FROM waste_disposal_containers WHERE location LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY capacity DESC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM disposal_containers;
SELECT container_id, location FROM disposal_containers WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT container_id, location, current_level FROM disposal_containers ORDER BY current_level DESC;
SELECT container_id, location, capacity, current_level FROM disposal_containers WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT restocked_id, container_id, restocked_date, restocked_by, restocked_amount FROM restocking_history WHERE restocked_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM disposal_containers;
SELECT location, capacity FROM disposal_containers WHERE current_level > 50;
SELECT container_id, location FROM disposal_containers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT container_id, restocked_date, restocked_by FROM restocking_history WHERE restocked_amount < 100 ORDER BY restocked_date ASC;
SELECT container_id, SUM(restocked_amount) AS total_restocked FROM restocking_history GROUP BY container_id HAVING total_restocked > 500;
SELECT * FROM waste_containers;
SELECT id, location, current_stock FROM waste_containers WHERE current_stock > 0;
SELECT container_type, location FROM waste_containers WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT id, container_type, location FROM waste_containers ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT restocked_by, restocked_date, restocked_quantity FROM restocking_records WHERE restocked_quantity > 10;
SELECT id, container_type, location FROM waste_containers;
SELECT * FROM restocking_records ORDER BY restocked_date DESC;
SELECT location, current_stock FROM waste_containers WHERE current_stock > 0;
SELECT container_id, restocked_quantity, restocked_by FROM restocking_records WHERE restocked_quantity > 10;
SELECT id, location, capacity FROM waste_containers WHERE capacity < current_stock;
SELECT * FROM Waste_Containers ORDER BY container_name DESC;
SELECT container_name, capacity FROM Waste_Containers WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT container_name, location FROM Waste_Containers WHERE location = 'Street A';
SELECT container_id, container_name, capacity FROM Waste_Containers WHERE capacity < 500 ORDER BY container_id;
SELECT c.container_name, i.quantity, c.location FROM Waste_Containers c JOIN Container_Inventory i ON c.container_id = i.container_id;
SELECT * FROM Waste_Containers ORDER BY container_id DESC;
SELECT container_name, capacity FROM Waste_Containers WHERE location = 'City Park';
SELECT SUM(restock_quantity) AS total_restocked, AVG(restock_quantity) AS avg_restock FROM Restocking_Logs GROUP BY container_id;
SELECT container_name, SUM(collected_quantity) AS total_collected FROM Waste_Containers c JOIN Waste_Collection wc ON c.container_id = wc.container_id GROUP BY container_name;
SELECT c.container_name, ci.quantity AS current_quantity FROM Waste_Containers c LEFT JOIN Container_Inventory ci ON c.container_id = ci.container_id ORDER BY ci.quantity DESC, c.container_name;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalContainers;
SELECT container_id, location, current_level FROM WasteDisposalContainers WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT container_id, container_type, capacity, last_restock_date FROM WasteDisposalContainers ORDER BY last_restock_date DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, category FROM WasteMaterials WHERE category = 'Recyclable';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, role FROM Employees WHERE role = 'Supervisor';
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalContainers WHERE location = 'Central Park';
SELECT container_id, capacity, current_level FROM WasteDisposalContainers WHERE current_level < capacity;
SELECT container_type, location, capacity FROM WasteDisposalContainers ORDER BY location DESC;

SELECT wdc.container_id, wm.material_name, rh.restock_date FROM WasteDisposalContainers wdc JOIN WasteMaterials wm ON wdc.container_id = wm.material_id JOIN RestockingHistory rh ON wdc.container_id = rh.container_id;
SELECT employee_name, role, COUNT(*) AS total_containers FROM Employees e JOIN InventoryUpdates iu ON e.employee_id = iu.container_id GROUP BY employee_name, role ORDER BY total_containers DESC;
